steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8r8i1","text":"Grow hTERT-RPE1 cells in DMEM/F12 (Thermo Fisher Scientific) supplemented with 10% FBS (Thermo Fisher Scientific), 1% glutaMAX, 1% penicillin-streptomycin. Keep cells at   with 5% CO2 in an enclosed incubator. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":170,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bt2hs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dbar","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2o24f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ef03t","text":"For general maintenance, when cells reach 80-90% confluency, detach them from the dish with Trypsin and dilute 1:10-20 in a new dish.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4o1k4","text":"For live imaging, maintain cells in a caged incubator with humidified atmosphere (5% CO2) at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":87,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"jeik","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2hkti","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88rpv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fgc0i","text":"The Yokogawa spinning disk field scanning confocal system with microlensing (CSU-W1 SoRa, Nikon) controlled by NIS elements (Nikon) software was used for imaging. Excitation wavelengths between 405-640 nm, CFI SR Plan ApoIR 60XC WI objective lens and SoRa lens-switched light path at 1x, 2.8x or 4x were used. SoRa images were deconvolved using the Batch Deconvolution (Nikon) software.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
